name: Claustrophobia (itch) (Matilda Lindell, SPARDA_Blizzard)
description:
This game is part 4 of 4 in an experimental prototype series where each week we make a new game around a new theme. This week's theme is irrational behavior. 

Game Idea:

You fell into a mine by accident and your goal is to climb back out. You are brave and resourceful but will panic if you're stuck in a claustrophobic location for too long, and will not enter any dark areas. 

Controls:

"WASD" to move

"E" to interact

"F" to toggle flashlight

Credits:

Mohammed Tamim - Programmer

Matilda Lindell  - Environment Artist

Noor Tert - Character Artist
